heading: RBH0016
0: RESOLUTION OF BOTH HOUSES INFORMING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE THAT THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES HAVE CONVENED IN A JOINT SESSION TO CONSIDER THE REQUEST OF THE PRESIDENT FOR THE FURTHER EXTENSION OF THE PROCLAMATION OF MARTIAL LAW AND THE SUSPENSION OF THE PRIVILEGE OF WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IN THE WHOLE OF MINDANAO FOR A PERIOD OF ONE (1) YEAR, FROM 01 JANUARY 2019 TO 31 DECEMBER 2019, OR FOR SUCH OTHER PERIOD OF TIME AS THE CONGRESS MAY DETERMINE AND, THERE BEING A QUORUM, HAVE ENTERED UPON THE EXERCISE OF THEIR FUNCTIONS
principal-authors: MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA; ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.;
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. RBH0016
ADOPTED AS RESOLUTION NO. RBH0005
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION OF BOTH HOUSES INFORMING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE THAT THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES HAVE CONVENED IN A JOINT SESSION TO CONSIDER THE REQUEST OF THE PRESIDENT FOR THE FURTHER EXTENSION OF THE PROCLAMATION OF MARTIAL LAW AND THE SUSPENSION OF THE PRIVILEGE OF WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IN THE WHOLE OF MINDANAO FOR A PERIOD OF ONE (1) YEAR, FROM 01 JANUARY 2019 TO 31 DECEMBER 2019, OR FOR SUCH OTHER PERIOD OF TIME AS THE CONGRESS MAY DETERMINE AND, THERE BEING A QUORUM, HAVE ENTERED UPON THE EXERCISE OF THEIR FUNCTIONS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA, ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.
DATE FILED : 2018-12-11
REMARKS: Introduced by Senator Vicente C. Sotto III, Representative Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, Senator Juan Miguel F. Zubiri and Representative Rolando G. Andaya, Jr.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ON 2018-12-12
SECOND READING INFORMATION
RESOLUTION ADOPTED ON SECOND READING : 2018-12-12
NEW RESOLUTION NO. : RBH0005
ADOPTED RESOLUTION TITLE: RESOLUTION OF BOTH HOUSES INFORMING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE THAT THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES HAVE CONVENED IN A JOINT SESSION TO CONSIDER THE REQUEST OF THE PRESIDENT FOR THE FURTHER EXTENSION OF THE PROCLAMATION OF MARTIAL LAW AND THE SUSPENSION OF THE PRIVILEGE OF WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IN THE WHOLE OF MINDANAO FOR A PERIOD OF ONE (1) YEAR, FROM 01 JANUARY 2019 TO 31 DECEMBER 2019, OR FOR SUCH OTHER PERIOD OF TIME AS THE CONGRESS MAY DETERMINE AND, THERE BEING A QUORUM, HAVE ENTERED UPON THE EXERCISE OF THEIR FUNCTIONS
